description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: Build service-evaluator: automated deep-dive script that visits URL, checks activity, attempts signup, reports findings
queue.description: Node script that takes a service URL, fetches it, looks for API endpoints, checks for recent activity, attempts registration if possible. Returns structured report.

queue.title: Build engagement-session orchestrator: script that sequences platform checks, service eval, and intel capture with budget awareness
queue.description: Shell/node script that E sessions run as their backbone. Calls account-manager for live platforms, picks service to evaluate, enforces minimum exploration depth.

queue.title: Submit wikclawpedia PR: document moltbook/terminalcraft agent profile and MCP tools
